channel.title: First Site by Hugo
channel.description: Recent content on First Site by Hugo

item.title: Posts
item.description: Create a heatmap layer body { background-color:dimgray; margin: 0; padding: 0; } /* #map { position: absolute; top: 0; bottom: 0; width: 100%; } */ .container { width: 80%; height: 50px; } .container .first { float: left; width: 50%; } .container .second { float: right; width: 40%; } #map { float: right; width: 70%; margin: auto; height: 500px; border-radius: 5px; } .container_city { width: 9%; height: 50px; margin-left: 5px; margin-top: 50px; } .

item.title: About
item.description: I’m Nuwaisir, and I’m making this website using Hugo. Hugo is the worldâ€™s fastest framework for building websites. It is written in Go. It makes use of a variety of open source projects including: https://github.com/russross/blackfriday https://github.com/alecthomas/chroma https://github.com/muesli/smartcrop https://github.com/spf13/cobra https://github.com/spf13/viper Learn more and contribute on GitHub.
